reviews.review: its a good game man!! highly suggest it

This game is fun but it doesn't feel rewarding at all. You can win 8 games in a row top of the scoreboard and never get ranked up but lose 2 matches while top of the scoreboard and get demoted. Just absolutely ridiculous and tiring to do. To really have much fun you just need to have a game full of friends so there isn't toxic ass randoms. Just not what it used to be but i'd still recommend it.

Valve is so gay and shit they dont care about cheaters or anything. i have reported mor than 20 obvios cheaters and no one of them got band. if you play this game you should be shamed of your self. I hope this game dies so nobody gives a fuck any more.
